q: a radio talk show host, Mike Pence started a TV show in 1995. Although Mike Pence was inspired by Rush Limbaugh , he kept to his`` no personal attacks'' pledge. Conservative media, including Rush Limbaugh , have a tremendous blind spot when it comes to making a distinction between differences in public policy and personal differences, Mike Pence told The Indianapolis Star in 1995.
